about_the_game:
Join Emily on a tasty Time Management adventure! Step back in time to discover the restaurants that helped shape Emily into the talented chef and restaurateur she is today.

Whether you're a longtime fan or new to her world, you can now explore the origins of Emily's cooking journey across 8 unique restaurants.

Guide Emily as she masters a variety of cuisines—from comforting American classics to vibrant Mexican dishes and bold Indian flavors. With your help, Emily will hone her cooking skills and whip up delicious dishes to serve to hungry customers.

Tackle 80 Time Management cooking levels and unlock Endless mode for infinite culinary fun. Challenge yourself with a variety of engaging mini-games, hire handy waitstaff, upgrade menu items, decorate each restaurant, and much more!

FEATURES:

⏰ 80 Time Management levels

Put your multitasking skills to the test in 80 fast-paced cooking levels.

🍕 8 unique restaurants

Explore 8 different locations, each with its own charm and character!

💞 Endless levels

Unlock an infinite number of levels for non-stop culinary creativity.

🌮 Global cuisines

Whip up delicious dishes from around the world.

🥟 Engaging mini-games

Enjoy a variety of challenging mini-games that add an extra layer of fun.

🎸 Handy helpers

Hire a trusty waiter, entertainer, and cleaner to keep everything running smoothly.

🍱 Upgrade menu items

Enhance your dishes to impress customers and boost your earnings.

🔓 Unlock interior upgrades

Transform your dining spaces with helpful upgrades that enhance your abilities.

✨ Decorate restaurants

Unleash your creativity and decorate each restaurant to make it truly unique!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.12 or higher
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Delicious: The First Course

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
